Interface IParameterListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IActivationBufferListener, IAuralModuleListener, IChunkTypeListener, IDeclarativeModuleListener, IDeclarativeModuleListener2, IPerceptualMemoryModuleListener, IProceduralModuleListener, IProductionListener, IVisualModuleListener

    public interface IParameterListener
extends java.util.EventListener
    a listener for changes to object parameters (typically subsymbolic elements)

    developer
